org.linqs.psl.application.inference

Class MPEInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.inference.MPEInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class MPEInference
extends Object
implements ModelApplication
    Infers the most-probable explanation (MPE) state of the RandomVariableAtoms persisted in a Database, according to a Model, given the Database's ObservedAtoms.

    The set of RandomVariableAtoms is those persisted in the Database when mpeInference() is called. This set must contain all RandomVariableAtoms the Model might access. (DatabasePopulator can help with this.)

    Author:
    Stephen Bach

      • mpeInference

        public FullInferenceResult mpeInference()
        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the GroundAtoms in the Database according to the Model and commits the updated truth values back to the Database.

        The RandomVariableAtoms to be inferred are those persisted in the Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.

        Returns:
        inference results
        See Also:
        DatabasePopulator
